title: Grants a special apportionment to certain school districts for certain public pension liabilities
summary: Grants a special apportionment to school districts having a population of between 195,000 and 219,000, for additional expenses incurred in the 2009-2010 and 2010-2011 school years associated with changes in public pension liabilities.
actClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 57 of the laws of 2005, amending the education law relating to providing for school budget revote, in relation to a special apportionment for public pension accruals
